title: How FTC Chair Lina Khan wants to modernize the watchdog agency
itunes:title: How FTC Chair Lina Khan wants to modernize the watchdog agency
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: One of the big players in the push to update tech industry regulations is the Federal Trade Commission, whose job is to protect consumers and promote competition in the economy. It’s been just over a year since Lina Khan took over as chair of the agency and about a month since the confirmation of a third Democrat, Alvaro Bedoya, to the five-member commission, which broke a prolonged deadlock at the agency. That means Khan has a fresh chance to advance her agenda. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams recently spoke with Khan at her office and asked her about taking on Big Tech in the courts.
